    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Map map,
                    java.util.List<Country> countries)
        Aggressive player will keep on attacking till the time one thing happens: 1. either he lost the attacking country 2. or it runs out of options to attack, i.e., for loop runs completely.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface AttackStrategy
        Parameters:
        map - Map
